## 运行环境 / Environment

1. Python: `3.10`
2. OS: `Windows 10+`

## 安装 / Installation

需安装库: `PySide6, requests, PySide6-Fluent-Widgets[full], PySideSix-Frameless-Window`

确保运行路径在`sangonomiya`文件夹下

```commandline
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## 打包 / Packaging

安装`nuitka`
```commandline
pip install nuitka
```

找到`build-development.bat`并运行
